db:section.db:title: QString Qt::convertFromPlainText(const QString &plain, Qt::WhiteSpaceMode mode = WhiteSpacePre)
db:section.db:para: Converts the plain text string plain to an HTML-formatted paragraph while preserving most of its look.
mode defines how whitespace is handled.
This function is defined in the <QTextDocument> header file.

db:section.db:title: bool Qt::mightBeRichText(const QString &text)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the string text is likely to be rich text; otherwise returns false.

This function uses a fast and therefore simple heuristic. It mainly checks whether there is something that looks like a tag before the first line break. Although the result may be correct for common cases, there is no guarantee.
This function is defined in the <QTextDocument> header file.
